text_block_list.text:
It had been a while since I became Durandal's trainer. 
The days we spent working together were going swimmingly——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-dono. 
Inspection and warming-up of my joints has been completed.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My 『Holy Sword』 is in pristine order. 
Now, please give me my orders.
choice_data_list: Let's start with a light warm-up

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Understood, my lord. A canter worthy of the King, 
I swear to demonstrate it without fail.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Yes. My King's will be done——

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text: Looks like you're getting along just fine.

The person that called out to me was the person who inspired 
me to become a trainer, the senpai trainer that I looked up to.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Of course, it's the training of a duo that's getting a lot of 
attention now. ……But still, is Durandal the same as ever?
『Durandal, I beseech thee』

『——Victory, glory, jubilation. These are the duties of an 
Uma Musume. Swear, as a protector, to uphold these values』

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes——I swear. From this day forth, as your knight, 
I will strive to fulfill that role.

Ever since that knighting ceremony, 
she has been serving faithfully as my knight.

Everyday I would need to aim to reach 
higher and higher towards her ideals.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, that's a good look on you. 
It looks like you really are getting along——but listen well.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
In the future, if someone who looks down on her dream 
were to appear, you alone cannot turn away from her.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Trainers are the supporting pillars to an Uma Musume's dream. 
Never forget that you are their "Steadfast Guide".

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(What's going on?……Trainer-dono's gaze feels much more intense 
than usual today. Have my knightly qualities improved?)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Fufu……in that case, I must prove it. That my power is 
even more brilliant——With a flourish of the 『Holy Sword』!)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——Haaaaaaaaaaa!

I couldn't help but be mesmerized by her sudden 
acceleration. Her overwhelming closing power would 
allow her to chase even in short distance races——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——My lord. 
Durandal has returned.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
You said to start with a 『light warm-up』 but, 
I could feel the weight of your expectations 
so I unconsciously moved to live up to them……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
However, I wish to be your knight and protector. 
Fulfilling this is my purpose.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
To that end, to sharpen my sword一 
My desire is to give my all in each race一

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My running, all of it, is for my esteemed King. With this 『Holy 
Sword』, I will, without fail, bring unending glory to my King.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
choice_data_list: I believe you will achieve results
I believe you will achieve results

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (……Aaaah, it truly has to be this person——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(They deeply believe in me, affirming my 
pride as a knight to this extent. And also——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(They praise me looooooots!! 
Always genuinely, and more than anyone!!)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——Trainer-dono. My noble "King".

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My 『Holy Sword』 will always be at your side. 
As long as……you desire it.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Well then, let's move on to the next menu! 
All for my revered King——

Durandal was heading to the sloped course with 
great enthusiasm. Meanwhile, I reaffirmed my 
desire to continue supporting her aspirations.
